xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.7 Pañhāvāra » 2.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya » Āhāra
Āhāramissakaghaṭanā
Kusalattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Āhāra
Āhāramissakaghaṭanā
453.
1432Āhāra atthi avigatanti nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte ekaṃ, naaññamaññe tīṇi, nanissaye ekaṃ, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta, naāsevane satta, nakamme satta, navipāke satta, naindriye satta, najhāne satta, namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
<< Āhāradukaup Sahajātasāmaññaghaṭanā >>
